channel.title: CSS on Quickly How Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in CSS on Quickly How Tutorials

item.title: How to Edit CSS in the Archie Theme
item.description: This tutorial covers: 1. How to Add Custom CSS to the Archie Theme 2. How to Edit the CSS of the Archie Theme 3. How to Change the Font of the Archie Theme How to Add Custom CSS to the Archie Theme Step 1: In the root directory of your Hugo blog, open the hugo.toml file, and add this line: [params] customcss = ["css/first.css"] Step 2: Use Visual Studio Code or your favorite editor to create the assets/css/first.
